results.title: 73% MSMEs report business growth via digital adoption, led by UPI and smartphones: Survey
results.description: PayNearby's MSME Digital Index Report reveals that over 73% of small businesses in semi-urban and rural India have boosted income and efficiency through digital tools. Smartphone usage and UPI transactions are dominant, especially among women entrepreneurs who show increased comfort with mobile-led business management.

results.title: Mumbai Local Train: Man Dies At Mumbra Station, Railway Pravasi Sangh Blames 'Death Zone' New Bridge Design
results.description: A 21-year-old man, Ayaan Shaikh, died after falling from a crowded local train near Mumbra's new bridge on Friday morning. The incident has sparked fresh concerns over safety flaws and overcrowding on Mumbai’s suburban rail network.

results.title: Cachar: Proactive steps taken to ensure uninterrupted supply of essentials
